name: mystery-egg
effect: Must be obtained to trigger the break-in at Professor Elm’s lab, the first rival battle, and access to johto route 31.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
